thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Merle Koch

author: Merle Koch
title: Merle Koch
text:
This was my first time using Airtasker and I was very happy, easy to use, I had three people interested straight away, got 2 Quote: s, accepted one who could do the next day and was very happy with the outcome. They turned up when stated and did a fantastic job.
Very happy - will try Airtasker again and fully recommend.
My only negative is that I couldn't find on the website enough info on how it works, like whether everyone sees the Quote: s given or not. Found out by asking the contractor chosen and he advised they do not see other Quote: s only the comments.
